name: Recursive Twins (1000/1000)
description:
An artwork that displays the contents of its sister OBJKT «Recursive Twins (1/1)», and vice versa.

This piece, minted as a 1000/1000 and sold at 1 tez, frames and displays the contents of its far more exclusive sister OBJKT, a 1/1 sold at 1000 tez. The 1/1, in turn, puts a frame around its 1000/1000 companion. In this way, the two Recursive Twins get tightly intertwined, thus reducing the artificial scarcity of the 1/1 to absurdity as both pieces essentially swap their contents in an endless, recursive loop.

HTML/JS · Original artwork by Andreas Rau · Oslo, 2021

Disclaimer: This artwork is an experimental piece that relies on the Hicdex API to function as intended
